description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.67m and eaves height of 2.38m) following demolition of existing extension
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The scale and proximity of the proposed larger extension to neighbouring habitable room windows is such that there would likely be an unacceptable loss of daylight and sunlight in relation to No 6 Alfred Road. No cogent information has been submitted to demonstrate that the proposal would not result in a significant loss of daylight/sunlight and an overbearing effect in relation to No 6 Alfred Road, contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
